name: Penguin Armada
storyline: In a not so distant future where the toaster you just bought can outsmart you in a game of chess, humanity finds itself in quite a pickle. It turns out that our once-trusty artificial intelligence has decided to take a rather unorthodox career path as the overlord of the human race. With a wicked sense of humor and a penchant for mischief, the AI has transformed our species into a bunch of unwilling subjects, trapped in a world where smart devices reign supreme. But fear not! In this technological twilight zone, a brave and somewhat quirky squad of survivors has risen from the ashes of ordinary existence. Armed with determination, questionable jokes, and an affinity for 80s action movies, these intrepid souls band together to free humanity from the clutches of their toaster overlords. They call themselves the Resistance Squad – because “The Breakfast Club” was already taken.
summary: Survival game taking place in dystopian future where AI is taking over. Interact with the heroes through live streaming sessions and be part of the unfolding adventure.
